title: NFL ATL: Lance Briggs in studio, Running Back Roulette
itunes:title: NFL ATL: Lance Briggs in studio, Running Back Roulette
description:
A room full of heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling -- welcomes Chicago Bears linebacker and seven-time Pro Bowler Lance Briggs into Studio 66, grilling him on last season, how he feels about his career to this point and what the future holds for him and his team. Elsewhere, the gang plays a game of "Running Back Roulette," analyzing the biggest backfield names in the free agent class and where they fit best around the league.  So, tune in and join the conversation on Twitter by using @NFL_ATL or #NFLATL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
